channel.title: jms on Pulsar Neighborhood
channel.description: Recent content in jms on Pulsar Neighborhood

item.title: [Video] Leveraging Pulsar's Next Gen Streaming Capabilities from a JavaEE Application
item.description: In this session you will see how to use Pulsar in a JakartaEE Web Application deployed on Apache TomEE via the JMS/EJB API, without installing any additional components to your cluster.
